about_the_game:
PRESENTATION

This is a classic 2D old-school RPG in the style of the retro Super NES and Genesis RPGs such as Final Fantasy and Dragon Quest.

Joan is a warrior in the south side of the Sandflats Canyon, she lives a hard but fulfilling life in Oakleaf Village. Under Shatner's guidance, the villagers have an unique opportunity to live amongst the Golems, great and powerful beings who have been aiding humankind for the past centuries. The Golems will those purest of heart and gift them with the chance of living in Elysium, a place of happiness and joy.

When her best friend Krista is chosen to receive the gift, the foundations of what Joan believed for her entire life starts to shake...

FEATURES

  • A storyline focusing on the power of friendship and courage

  • Explore a vast array of different locations, forest, canyons, deserts, caves, dungeons

  • Freedom to traverse through the world at your own pace

  • Quest Journal to help you keep track of your objectives

  • Mouse Support
